scripts.build:all: npm run build:backends && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backends: echo 'Building backends...' && npm run build:venue_management_backend && npm run build:booking_management_backend && npm run build:user_management_backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd user_management_frontend/venue-vista-frontend && npm ci --production=false && npm run build
scripts.start:all: npm run start:backends & npm run start:frontend
scripts.start:backends: npm run start:venue_management_backend & npm run start:booking_management_backend & npm run start:user_management_backend
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backends && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backends: cd venue_management_backend && npm install && cd ../booking_management_backend && npm install && cd ../user_management_backend && npm install
